p: In the Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA, https://www.cancer.gov/) database, the transcriptome data of breast cancer (BRCA) samples and control samples were downloaded. Moreover, the TNBC cell lines MDA-MB-231 and common breast epithelial cell lines MCF10A were derived from the Shanghai Cell Bank of the Shanghai Academy of Sciences. BALB/c nude female mice (weight 18-22g, 4â€“6 weeks old) were obtained from the Animal Experiment Center of Guangxi Medical University. All experiments were approved by the Animal Ethics Approval Committee of Guangxi Medical University.
